value.suggestion: Change 'console.error' to 'console.warn' or 'console.info' for non-critical issues.

value.message: Access control error during user restoration does not explicitly deny access; user state may remain unchanged if error occurs.
value.suggestion: Explicitly set user to null in the catch block to ensure access is denied if restoration fails.
